import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import Button from '@material-ui/core/Button'; import './Enroll.css' const url = "http://127.0.0.1:8000"; function Enroll() { const [user,setUser] = useState({"user_name":"","user_phone":"","user_address":"","user_email":""}); const addUser = ()=> { const requestOptions = { method: 'POST', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' }, body: JSON.stringify(user) }; fetch(url+'/adduser', requestOptions) .then(response => response.json()) .then(data => { console.log("user added"); })} return (


setUser({...user,"user_name":e.target.value})} >


setUser({"user_phone":e.target.value})} >


setUser({"user_address":e.target.value})} >


setUser({"user_email":e.target.value})} >
) } export default Enroll
